title: Lady Kinnaird
credit_line: Gift of Mrs. B. F. Jones, Jr.
provenance_text:
Commissioned from the artist, 1811 (entry no. 549) for 100 guineas [1]; J. J. Gillespie Company, Pittsburgh, PA

Notes:
[1]. The portrait is of Lady Olivia Letitia Catherine FitzGerald (9 September 1787 - Bath, 28 February 1858); married in London on 8 May 1806 Charles Kinnaird, 8th Lord (Baron?) Kinnaird (12 April 1780 - Brighton, 12 December 1826)

Record under review for update, CGK

creator.birth_place: Plymouth (City of Plymouth, England, United Kingdom)
